Text: check out my other mod uploads. i will be making more well packaged oblivion uploads since i am working on an oblivion project that requires me to do so.

i think this has about 50 something lightsabers to the game, including double lightsabers. they will clip if used with vanilla oblvion animations. still, i use vanilla animations and i think its great even if it does clip. i dont care, they are light sabers!
